author: IGN
description:
Join the associate game director of Assassin's Creed Shadows for a look at gameplay in this walkthrough video for the upcoming action RPG. Explore Nijo Palace through different approaches with protagonists Naoe and Yasuke and see their stealth and combat playstyles in action. Assassin's Creed Shadows will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, macOS, Amazon Luna, and PC (Steam) on March 20, 2025.

In Assassin’s Creed Shadows, you will live the intertwined stories of Naoe, an adept shinobi Assassin from Iga Province, and Yasuke, the powerful African samurai of historical legend. Against the backdrop of the turbulent late Sengoku period, this remarkable duo will discover their common destiny as they usher in a new era for Japan. From chaos to purpose, from darkness to light. A new Creed rises over Japan.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Official Dual Paths: Naoe & Yasuke Overview

author: IGN
description: oin creative director Jonathan Jacques-Belletête at developer Rogue Factor for a deep dive into the investigation mechanics of Hell Is Us in this narrated gameplay video for the upcoming third-person action-adventure game. Jonathan Jacques-Belletête shows the importance of discovery and exploration, investigation gameplay, and how players can chart their course through their adventure. We get to see conversations with characters you can meet as part of this investigation gameplay, clues, secrets to find, and more. Hell is Us will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S on September 4, 2025.
title: Hell is Us - Official Gameplay Deep Dive | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the latest highlights from the Skate Insider playtest. Skate will be available in Early Access in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Skate - Official Insider Playtest Highlights: February 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description: Styx makes a return. Check out the Styx: Blades of Greed cinematic reveal trailer for this third installment of the stealth action game from developer Cyanide Studio. The infamous, sharp-witted goblin Styx is back in Styx: Blades of Greed is a blend of stealth, action and strategy set in a vertically expansive medieval fantasy world. The mission? Steal Quartz, a rare and magical resource, while eliminating enemies with skill and precision. Styx: Blades of Greed will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S in fall 2025.
title: Styx: Blades of Greed - Official Cinematic Reveal Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at gameplay from The Occultist in this latest trailer for the upcoming first-person horror game. Paranormal investigator Alan Rebels travels to the eerie island of Godstone to uncover the truth behind his father’s disappearance. Armed with his mystical pendulum, he explores foggy streets, haunted ruins, and a cult’s dark past. The Occultist will be available on PC (Steam), PS5, and Xbox Series X/S in 2026.
title: The Occultist - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description: See what's coming in Season 3 of Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown in this latest trailer for the racing game, including solo mode, AI difficulty selection, navigation mode, the return of convoy missions, and more. Three new cars--Aston Martin Valour, DeLorean DMC-12, and Ferrari Laferrari Aperta--will also be available in the upcoming season. Season 3 of Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown begins on March 19, 2025.
title: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown - Official Season 3 Preview Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description: Learn more about the story and your mission, and see gameplay from Dragonkin: The Banished in this launch trailer for the hack n' slash game. Dragonkin: The Banished is available now in Early Access on Steam.
title: Dragonkin: The Banished - Official Early Access Launch Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the reveal trailer for The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu, an upcoming first-person horror game with online co-op for up to 4 players from developer ACE Team (Clash: Artifacts of Chaos and the Zeno Clash series). Step into a strange jungle, see nightmarish creatures, and get a peek at co-op gameplay in this The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu trailer. The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu will be available in 2025 on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S.

Deep within an eerie and oppressive jungle, players must explore and survive monstrous, otherworldly entities that distort their senses and threaten their sanity… and their lives. Was that sound just an hallucination? Am I losing my mind and attacking my ally, or is there truly a hostile creature lurking in the shadows? As players venture deeper into the jungle, only teamwork will ensure they make it back alive.
title: The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu - Official Reveal Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business, an upcoming standalone expansion for the FPS game. To reach the top of Omni Tower, now overrun by elite mercenaries, players will have access to new weapons, brutal finish moves, and special missions. These missions will take them through intense flashbacks, offering the chance to play as Alex Murphy. RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S in summer 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Robocop: Rogue City - Official Unfinished Business Expansion Reveal Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Rennsport trailer for the reveal that this racing simulator game is coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X/S in 2025, featuring full crossplay compatibility. Rennsport is currently available in Early Access on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Rennsport - Official Console Announcement Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Meet Romeo and Juliet in this latest Ravenswatch trailer for the co-op action roguelike game. See these two new heroes in action as the new trailer gives us a peek at gameplay. Ravenswatch is available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S. The free Romeo & Juliet DLC will be available in May 2025. 

One wields a rapier, while the other wields a firearm, requiring players to synchronize their movements and special attacks for maximum efficiency. Designed to be played exclusively as a duo, these legendary Shakespearean figures are inseparable in both life and death, meaning they must protect one another at all costs.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ravenswatch - Official Romeo & Juliet DLC Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a peek at gameplay and the twisted world of Edge of Eternity in this latest trailer for the upcoming action RPG from developer Midgar Studio (creators of Edge of Eternity). Return to the land of Heryon in Edge of Memories, and join Eline and her companions on a journey to eradicate the evil threatening their world. Edge of Memories will be available on PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC in fall 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Edge of Memories - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Meet Brit, check out gameplay, and get a glimpse into the horrors she'll find in this latest trailer for The Fading of Nicole Wilson, an upcoming story-driven folk-horror adventure game. The Fading of Nicole Wilson will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch.

Teenager Brit takes a ghost-hunting job at the eerie Timberline Hotel, hoping for fame. But when her employer is hospitalized, she must investigate alone. Armed with her camera and paranormal gear, she quickly realizes there are more dangerous forces at play than any supernatural entity.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Fading of Nicole Wilson - Official Gameplay Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the reveal trailer for Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss, an upcoming psychological thriller game inspired by Lovecraft's universe from Big Bad Wolf (developers of The Council and Vampire: The Masquerade - Swansong). Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S in 2026. 

In Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss, you take on the role of Noah, an agent of Ancile, a secret Interpol division specializing in occult cases, as he investigates the mysterious disappearance of miners in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. His quest will lead him toyo the labyrinthine prison of R’lyeh, an ancient sunken city where Cthulhu is imprisoned. Alongside his AI companion Key, Noah must solve complex puzzles, make choices that will shape his fate, and resist the mind-corrupting influence of Cthulhu.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss - Official Cinematic Reveal Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025

author: IGN
description:
IGN partnered with Crucial to build a top of the line PC that would push Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty to the limit. The build includes: an RTX 5090, AMD 9800X3D CPU, X870E Aorus Pro Ice, 4TB of Crucial T705, 128GB of Crucial Pro DDR5 Pro OC Gaming Memory 6400, Kraken Elite 360 RGB, and Thermaltake Toughpower GF3 Snow 1200W PSU. All housed within a white, Hyte Y70 Touch Infinite Case. 
Presented by Crucial. Game harder and build better at crucial.com
title: Playing Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty With Ray-Tracing Overdrive on an RTX 5090

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Last of Us DualSense limited-edition controller, featuring glossy trophy icons from both installments of The Last of Us. The Last of Us DualSense controller will be available on April 10, 2025. Pre-orders will be available from March 14, 2025.

#TheLastOfUs #PlayStation #Gaming
title: The Last of Us DualSense Controller - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet Hollowpoint and see the character in action in this latest FragPunk trailer for the 5v5 hero shooter game. Hollowpoint is a master of long-range combat, eliminating enemies with deadly precision. Her electric rifle exposes targets, while her traps and smokescreens create the perfect setup for ambushes. 

FragPunk will be available on PC today, March 6, 2025, with Xbox Series X/S and PS5 (PlayStation 5) to follow.

#FragPunk #Gaming #Games
title: FragPunk - Official Hollowpoint Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this exclusive Clown in a Cornfield clip! Quinn and her father have just moved to the quiet town of Kettle Springs hoping for a fresh start. Instead, she discovers a fractured community that has fallen on hard times after the treasured Baypen Corn Syrup Factory burned down. As the locals bicker amongst themselves and tensions boil over, a sinister, grinning figure emerges from the cornfields to cleanse the town of its burdens, one bloody victim at a time. Welcome to Kettle Springs. The real fun starts when Frendo the clown comes out to play. Directed by Eli Craig, Clown in a Cornfield makes its world premiere at the SXSW film festival on March 10, 2025, before opening in theaters on May 9, 2025.

#Movies #ClownInACornfield #Horror
title: Clown in a Cornfield - Exclusive Clip (2025) Katie Douglas, Carson MacCormac

author: IGN
description:
Check out these Split Fiction Easter eggs! Split Fiction is the latest charming co-op game from Hazelight, the studio that brought you It Takes Two and A Way Out. Just like its spiritual predecessors, it’s loaded with easter eggs, Split Fiction secrets, and Split Fiction references to not only their past games but to a whole host of popular video games and movies. 

From Dark Souls, to Metal Gear Solid, here are 22 references hidden in Split Fiction.

#SplitFiction #Gaming #Games
title: Split Fiction Easter Eggs: 22 Awesome References

author: IGN
description: BitCraft Online is excited to announce they are coming to Steam Early Access on May 29, 2025. The upcoming open-world survival crafting MMORPG features a persistent single-world experience, community-driven action, city-building, a player-run economy, and deep social strategy. Wishlist now on Steam to get exclusive rewards and be among the first to join the journey! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3454650/BitCraft_Online
title: BitCraft Online - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: In this snippet from Podcast Beyond 886, As part of this month’s Beyond Game Club, we’re revisiting Batman Arkham Asylum, Rocksteady’s debut game featuring the Dark Knight, which arrived in 2009 and laid the groundwork for Arkham City and Arkham Knight. As much as we adore the massive open-world Gotham City, in a lot of ways, Arkham Asylum is the perfect Batman game: a mix of action-packed combat and detective work in the form of puzzles and navigating the labyrinthine penitentiary for Gotham’s most twisted denizens. So, what went wrong? Suicide Squad Kill The Justice League swung for the fences in multiple directions at once and ultimately struck out, while Gotham Knights sent us back into Gotham, but not as the character we’d most like to play as. Is it so hard to make a good Batman game? Well, yes, it’s hard to make any game, good or otherwise, about anything, let alone a character with this much lore and history and reverence. But still, a Rocksteady take on Batman Beyond and/or
title: Revisiting Arkham Asylum Just Makes us Want a New Batman Game - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
HBO's The Last of Us Season 2 will be dropping soon, but fans of the franchise hoping for a Part 3 of the game might be waiting a long, long time. Like forever. Naughty Dog's Neil Druckmann recently told Variety that a Part 3 may never happen. However, Part 2's TV adaptation will go on for at least two seasons, so fans have that to look forward to. In other news, Marvel 1943's Black Panther recently let slip the game's tentative release window: Christmas 2025. While an official release date hasn't been given, a holiday launch doesn't seem too unreasonable. And finally, Nintendo just won another major lawsuit, this time against counterfeit Amiibo sellers. Nintendo and Amazon teamed up to take down sellers peddling Amiibo cards and other devices that mimic Amiibo functionality. Nintendo won with a judgement of $7 million, but since none of the accused responded to the lawsuit, we're not sure how Nintendo is going to collect.
title: The Last of Us Part 3 Unlikely, Says Naughty Dog’s Neil Druckmann - IGN Daily Fix
